title: Reading Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance - Chapter 11 - Part 1
description:
Sorry about the sound! - Contrasts, transition, and high elevation

Lee Glover, who took this journey, revealed to me that the winding highway and high elevation was, in fact,  Beartooth Mountain Highway and Beartooth Pass, as well as much more involved material on that area. He also provided me with this link:
Beartooth Highway documentary: https://youtu.be/78HnNT689ac
Lee's footage of Beartooth Bridge: https://youtu.be/KMFRAP1sNr0
